metadata.title: CVE-2015-1833 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
XML external entity (XXE) vulnerability in Apache Jackrabbit before 2.0.6,2.2.x before 2.2.14, 2.4.x before 2.4.6, 2.6.x before 2.6.6, 2.8.x before2.8.1, and 2.10.x before 2.10.1 allows remote attackers to read arbitraryfiles and send requests to intranet servers via a crafted WebDAV request.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1833` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjackrabbit-java - 2.3.6-1+deb8u1build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jackrabbit package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.6-1+deb8u1build0.14.04.1').
